mosinstall.name: mod_zoom_pics
mosinstall.author: Per Lasse Baasch
mosinstall.description: mod_zoom_pics is a official module for joomla! Open Source with the component zOOm media gallery. Not some styles with div may not work on every template. If it is so, please debug and notify me. Furthermore the scroller may not work in older browsers. Requirements: com_zoom_2.5rc1 or higher. Download at www.zoomfactory.org and www.skycube.net - demo at www.bsekrank.de - Have fun
